article.title: Truetech to Provide Chemical Detector Kits
article.text: Truetech, Riverhead, N.Y., was awarded an $8,071,865 firm-fixed-price, multi-year, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for the procurement of M256A2 chemical agent detector kits. Army Contracting Command, Warren, Mich., is the contracting activity (W56HZV-14-D-0061).
